name: Formula XD
description: Take on the role of racing team manager - hiring drivers, negotiating contracts with sponsors and engine suppliers, making the big decisions necessary to keep your team above water. You'll issue orders to your drivers out onto the track, and be responsible for guiding them to victory or defeat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (XP/Vista untested) Processor: Intel Core2Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or equivalent Storage: 640 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2GHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space
